entity.name: event
entity.query: select *, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,startTime,stopTime) as duration from Event

entity.name: venue
entity.query: select * from Venue where parent_id is null and id='${event.VENUE_ID}' union select p.* from Venue p, Venue v where v.parent_id is not null and v.parent_id=p.id and v.id='${event.VENUE_ID}'

entity.name: event_tag
entity.query: select TAGS_ID from Event_Tag where EVENT_ID='${event.id}'

entity.name: tag
entity.query: SELECT title FROM Tag WHERE id = '${event_tag.TAGS_ID}'
